H0.text: What type of 'helpful' businesses operate on the basis of the Rochdale Principles that were formulated in 1844. Mutual Aid Society

H1.text: What type of 'helpful' businesses operate on the basis of the Rochdale Principles that were formulated in 1844. Community Land Trust

H2.text: What type of 'helpful' businesses operate on the basis of the Rochdale Principles that were formulated in 1844. Credit Union

H3.text: What type of 'helpful' businesses operate on the basis of the Rochdale Principles that were formulated in 1844. Co-Op

A4.text: The Rochdale Principles require cash trading (no credit extended).

A5.text: Cooperatives are voluntary organisations, open to all persons able to use their services and willing to accept the responsibilities of membership, without gender, social, racial, political or religious discrimination.
